00020 template <class DequeType>
00021 class const_deque_iterator;
00022 
00023 template <class DequeType>
00024 class deque_iterator
00025 {
00026     typedef typename DequeType::size_type size_type;
00027     typedef typename DequeType::vector_type vector_type;
00028     typedef deque_iterator<DequeType>       _Self;
00029     DequeType * Deque;
00030     size_type Offset;
00031 
00032     deque_iterator(DequeType * Deque_, size_type Offset_) :
00033         Deque(Deque_), Offset(Offset_)
00034     { }
00035 
00036     friend class const_deque_iterator<DequeType>;
00037 
00038 public:
00039     typedef typename DequeType::value_type value_type;
00040     typedef typename DequeType::pointer pointer;
00041     typedef typename DequeType::const_pointer const_pointer;
00042     typedef typename DequeType::reference reference;
00043     typedef typename DequeType::const_reference const_reference;
00044     typedef deque_iterator<DequeType> iterator;
00045     typedef const_deque_iterator<DequeType> const_iterator;
00046     friend class deque<value_type, vector_type>;
00047     typedef std::random_access_iterator_tag iterator_category;
00048     typedef typename DequeType::difference_type difference_type;
00049 
00050     deque_iterator() : Deque(NULL), Offset(0) { }
00051 
00052     difference_type operator - (const _Self & a) const
00053     {
00054         size_type SelfAbsOffset = (Offset >= Deque->begin_o) ?
00055                                   Offset : (Deque->Vector.size() + Offset);
00056         size_type aAbsOffset = (a.Offset >= Deque->begin_o) ?
00057                                a.Offset : (Deque->Vector.size() + a.Offset);
00058 
00059         return SelfAbsOffset - aAbsOffset;
00060     }
00061 
00062     difference_type operator - (const const_iterator & a) const
00063     {
00064         size_type SelfAbsOffset = (Offset >= Deque->begin_o) ?
00065                                   Offset : (Deque->Vector.size() + Offset);
00066         size_type aAbsOffset = (a.Offset >= Deque->begin_o) ?
00067                                a.Offset : (Deque->Vector.size() + a.Offset);
00068 
00069         return SelfAbsOffset - aAbsOffset;
00070     }
00071 
00072     _Self operator - (size_type op) const
00073     {
00074         return _Self(Deque, (Offset + Deque->Vector.size() - op) % Deque->Vector.size());
00075     }
00076 
00077     _Self operator + (size_type op) const
00078     {
00079         return _Self(Deque, (Offset + op) % Deque->Vector.size());
00080     }
00081 
00082     _Self & operator -= (size_type op)
00083     {
00084         Offset = (Offset + Deque->Vector.size() - op) % Deque->Vector.size();
00085         return *this;
00086     }
00087 
00088     _Self & operator += (size_type op)
00089     {
00090         Offset = (Offset + op) % Deque->Vector.size();
00091         return *this;
00092     }
00093 
00094     reference operator *()
00095     {
00096         return Deque->Vector[Offset];
00097     }
00098 
00099     pointer operator ->()
00100     {
00101         return &(Deque->Vector[Offset]);
00102     }
00103 
00104     const_reference operator *() const
00105     {
00106         return Deque->Vector[Offset];
00107     }
00108 
00109     const_pointer operator ->() const
00110     {
00111         return &(Deque->Vector[Offset]);
00112     }
00113 
00114     reference operator [] (size_type op)
00115     {
00116         return Deque->Vector[(Offset + op) % Deque->Vector.size()];
00117     }
00118 
00119     const_reference operator [] (size_type op) const
00120     {
00121         return Deque->Vector[(Offset + op) % Deque->Vector.size()];
00122     }
00123 
00124     _Self & operator ++()
00125     {
00126         Offset = (Offset + 1) % Deque->Vector.size();
00127         return *this;
00128     }
00129     _Self operator ++(int)
00130     {
00131         _Self __tmp = *this;
00132         Offset = (Offset + 1) % Deque->Vector.size();
00133         return __tmp;
00134     }
00135     _Self & operator --()
00136     {
00137         Offset = (Offset + Deque->Vector.size() - 1) % Deque->Vector.size();
00138         return *this;
00139     }
00140     _Self operator --(int)
00141     {
00142         _Self __tmp = *this;
00143         Offset = (Offset + Deque->Vector.size() - 1) % Deque->Vector.size();
00144         return __tmp;
00145     }
00146     bool operator == (const _Self &a) const
00147     {
00148         assert(Deque == a.Deque);
00149         return Offset == a.Offset;
00150     }
00151     bool operator != (const _Self &a) const
00152     {
00153         assert(Deque == a.Deque);
00154         return Offset != a.Offset;
00155     }
00156 
00157     bool operator < (const _Self &a) const
00158     {
00159         assert(Deque == a.Deque);
00160         return (a - (*this)) > 0;
00161     }
00162 
00163     bool operator == (const const_iterator &a) const
00164     {
00165         assert(Deque == a.Deque);
00166         return Offset == a.Offset;
00167     }
00168     bool operator != (const const_iterator &a) const
00169     {
00170         assert(Deque == a.Deque);
00171         return Offset != a.Offset;
00172     }
00173 
00174     bool operator < (const const_iterator &a) const
00175     {
00176         assert(Deque == a.Deque);
00177         return (a - (*this)) > 0;
00178     }
00179 };

00339 template <class T, class VectorType = stxxl::vector<T> >
00340 class deque
00341 {
00342     typedef deque<T, VectorType>     Self_;
00343 public:
00344     typedef typename VectorType::size_type size_type;
00345     typedef typename VectorType::difference_type difference_type;
00346     typedef VectorType vector_type;
00347     typedef T value_type;
00348     typedef T * pointer;
00349     typedef const value_type * const_pointer;
00350     typedef T & reference;
00351     typedef const T & const_reference;
00352     typedef deque_iterator<Self_> iterator;
00353     typedef const_deque_iterator<Self_> const_iterator;
00354 
00355     friend class deque_iterator<Self_>;
00356     friend class const_deque_iterator<Self_>;
00357 private:
00358     VectorType Vector;
00359     size_type begin_o, end_o, size_;
00360 
00361     deque(const deque &)           // Copying external deques is discouraged
00362     // (and not implemented)
00363     {
00364         STXXL_FORMAT_ERROR_MSG(msg, "deque::deque, stxxl::deque copy constructor is not implemented yet");
00365         throw std::runtime_error(msg.str());
00366     }
00367 
00368     deque & operator=(const deque &);           // not implemented, and forbidden
00369 
00370     void double_array()
00371     {
00372         const size_type old_size = Vector.size();
00373         Vector.resize(2 * old_size);
00374         if (begin_o > end_o)
00375         {                         // copy data to the new end of the vector
00376             const size_type new_begin_o = old_size + begin_o;
00377             std::copy(      Vector.begin() + begin_o,
00378                             Vector.begin() + old_size,
00379                             Vector.begin() + new_begin_o);
00380             begin_o = new_begin_o;
00381         }
00382     }
00383 public:
00384 
00385     deque() : Vector((STXXL_DEFAULT_BLOCK_SIZE(T)) / sizeof(T)), begin_o(0), end_o(0), size_(0)
00386     { }
00387 
00388     deque(size_type n)
00389         : Vector((std::max)((size_type)(STXXL_DEFAULT_BLOCK_SIZE(T)) / sizeof(T), 2 * n)),
00390           begin_o(0), end_o(n), size_(n)
00391     { }
00392 
00393     ~deque()
00394     {             // empty so far
00395     }
00396 
00397     iterator begin()
00398     {
00399         return iterator(this, begin_o);
00400     }
00401     iterator end()
00402     {
00403         return iterator(this, end_o);
00404     }
00405     const_iterator begin() const
00406     {
00407         return const_iterator(this, begin_o);
00408     }
00409     const_iterator end() const
00410     {
00411         return const_iterator(this, end_o);
00412     }
00413 
00414     size_type size() const
00415     {
00416         return size_;
00417     }
00418 
00419     size_type max_size() const
00420     {
00421         return (std::numeric_limits < size_type > ::max)() / 2 - 1;
00422     }
00423 
00424     bool empty() const
00425     {
00426         return size_ == 0;
00427     }
00428 
00429     reference operator [] (size_type n)
00430     {
00431         assert(n < size());
00432         return Vector[(begin_o + n) % Vector.size()];
00433     }
00434 
00435     const_reference operator[](size_type n) const
00436     {
00437         assert(n < size());
00438         return Vector[(begin_o + n) % Vector.size()];
00439     }
00440 
00441     reference front()
00442     {
00443         assert(!empty());
00444         return Vector[begin_o];
00445     }
00446 
00447     const_reference front() const
00448     {
00449         assert(!empty());
00450         return Vector[begin_o];
00451     }
00452 
00453     reference back()
00454     {
00455         assert(!empty());
00456         return Vector[(end_o + Vector.size() - 1) % Vector.size()];
00457     }
00458 
00459     const_reference back() const
00460     {
00461         assert(!empty());
00462         return Vector[(end_o + Vector.size() - 1) % Vector.size()];
00463     }
00464 
00465     void push_front(const T & el)
00466     {
00467         if ((begin_o + Vector.size() - 1) % Vector.size() == end_o)
00468         {
00469             // an overflow will occur: resize the array
00470             double_array();
00471         }
00472 
00473         begin_o = (begin_o + Vector.size() - 1) % Vector.size();
00474         Vector[begin_o] = el;
00475         ++size_;
00476     }
00477 
00478     void push_back(const T & el)
00479     {
00480         if ((end_o + 1) % Vector.size() == begin_o)
00481         {
00482             // an overflow will occur: resize the array
00483             double_array();
00484         }
00485         Vector[end_o] = el;
00486         end_o = (end_o + 1) % Vector.size();
00487         ++size_;
00488     }
00489 
00490     void pop_front()
00491     {
00492         assert(!empty());
00493         begin_o = (begin_o + 1) % Vector.size();
00494         --size_;
00495     }
00496 
00497     void pop_back()
00498     {
00499         assert(!empty());
00500         end_o = (end_o + Vector.size() - 1) % Vector.size();
00501         --size_;
00502     }
00503 
00504     void swap(deque & obj)
00505     {
00506         std::swap(Vector, obj.Vector);
00507         std::swap(begin_o, obj.begin_o);
00508         std::swap(end_o, obj.end_o);
00509         std::swap(size_, obj.size_);
00510     }
00511 
00512     void clear()
00513     {
00514         Vector.clear();
00515         Vector.resize((STXXL_DEFAULT_BLOCK_SIZE(T)) / sizeof(T));
00516         begin_o = 0;
00517         end_o = 0;
00518         size_ = 0;
00519     }
00520 
00521     void resize(size_type n)
00522     {
00523         if (n < size())
00524         {
00525             do
00526             {
00527                 pop_back();
00528             } while (n < size());
00529         }
00530         else
00531         {
00532             if (n + 1 > Vector.size())
00533             {                     // need to resize
00534                 const size_type old_size = Vector.size();
00535                 Vector.resize(2 * n);
00536                 if (begin_o > end_o)
00537                 {                         // copy data to the new end of the vector
00538                     const size_type new_begin_o = Vector.size() - old_size + begin_o;
00539                     std::copy(      Vector.begin() + begin_o,
00540                                     Vector.begin() + old_size,
00541                                     Vector.begin() + new_begin_o);
00542                     begin_o = new_begin_o;
00543                 }
00544             }
00545             end_o = (end_o + n - size()) % Vector.size();
00546             size_ = n;
00547         }
00548     }
00549 };
00550 
00551 template <class T, class VectorType>
00552 bool operator == (const deque<T, VectorType> & a, const deque<T, VectorType> & b)
00553 {
00554     return std::equal(a.begin(), a.end(), b.begin());
00555 }
00556 
00557 template <class T, class VectorType>
00558 bool operator < (const deque<T, VectorType> & a, const deque<T, VectorType> & b)
00559 {
00560     return std::lexicographical_compare(a.begin(), a.end(), b.begin(), b.end());
00561 }

00567 namespace std
00568 {
00569     template <
00570               typename T,
00571               typename VT >
00572     void swap(      stxxl::deque < T, VT > & a,
00573                     stxxl::deque<T, VT> & b )
00574     {
00575         a.swap(b);
00576     }
00577 }
